data.name: MuteUserInstructions
data.value: To mute a person (you won't receive videos from them), you need to provide either their ID or their link.

data.name: UnmuteUserInstructions
data.value: To unmute a person (you will receive videos from them again), you need to provide either their ID or their link.

data.name: MuteTimeInstructions
data.value:
To convert seconds to other time units, use the following ratios:
1 minute = 60 seconds, 1 hour = 3600 seconds, 1 day = 86400 seconds.
Enter the mute time in seconds or a date in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS:

data.name: UserWillBeUnmuted
data.value: The user will be unmuted at {0:yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} (in {1} seconds).

data.value: The user will be unmuted at {0:yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss}.

data.name: UserWillBeMutedIndefinitely
data.value: The user will be muted indefinitely.

data.name: InvalidMuteTimeFormat
data.value: Please enter the mute time in seconds or a date in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Or type 'Indefinitely'.

data.name: HelpText
data.value:
üåê Adding contacts ‚Äî creating our own mini digital network As connect members of your media circle: 1. üîÑ Initiate communication Send the `/start` command and click the "Add contact" button in the menu. ‚Üí The bot will request a unique link from a user like: `1234ab56-cde-78fg-01hi-2j34k56790` 2. üîó Exchange of identifiers - Your link can be found in the "My link" section. - Pass it on to future contacts, for example, via a QR code or a private message. 3. ü§ù Contact confirmation - Paste the received link into the input field and send it to the bot. - If everything is correct, you will see a short user profile. 4. ‚è≥ Waiting for a response - Your request will be sent to the recipient, he will receive a notification. - When he accepts the invitation (through the "Review incoming applications" section), you can start sharing content with each other. And don't be afraid to use groups: Contacts can and should be grouped into different groups: `Colleagues', `Friends', `Society of Lovers birds üê¶Ô∏è' ‚Äî for point distribution to multiple contacts at once. --- üöÄ Downloading and forwarding content is a three‚Äîstep magic steps üì• Working with links Just send the bot a link + description (if necessary and necessarily from a new line) in format: 
https://youtu.be/–≤–∞—à–µ_—Å—É–ø–µ—Ä_–≤–∏–¥–µ–æ 
Take a look at this cosmic dance of the northern lights! 
üåå #nature #wow
If you use the description, then you must start from a new line! ‚Üí The bot will do the rest: 1. It will determine the platform, whether it's YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, or any other service. 2. Downloads the content in optimal quality (with the ability to adjust to your preferences in the configuration). 3. It will forward the video exactly there and to those who need it. ‚ú® üîÑ Automatic mailing list - Your file will be instantly sent to all specified contacts from your list. Conditions: Contacts must be with you are on the list. You should not be in the mud at these contacts. The mailing list parameters must be configured correctly. Advice: Use hashtags in the description! This will allow you to easily find content in your chat history. For example, search by tags #cats or #work_folk. The built‚Äîin hashtags also work, but their own ones are more convenient and personalized. --- ‚ú® The project is constantly evolving: New features are popping up like mushrooms after the rain! üçÑ To keep up to date with all updates and not Skip anything important: - Subscribe to my account in Mastodon. - Or just ask for news from the one who invited you to this fascinating digital media cycle! üòâ üîó Supported platforms can be found here The bot works with 1000+ sources thanks to the integration of yt-dlp ‚Äî full list here. Maybe in the future: Integration with Gallery-dl for downloading entire galleries and archives!

data.name: GroupHelpText
data.value:
Just send me the command: /link [video_link]
PS: The square brackets are not needed :)

data.name: WhosTheGeniusText
data.value:
Hello everyone! I'm ZenonEl, the creator of this bag of code and algorithms. My GitHub: https://github.com/ZenonEl/
The idea for this bot came to me when, once again, my friends had to manually send me TikTok videos (which I don't use) by downloading them, sending them, and then deleting them from their phones... So, I thought it would be great to simplify all these monotonous actions for them and decided to create this bot. Now, thanks to it, I can run a simple bot on my PC, set up a list of contacts from whom I want to receive videos, and that's it‚Äîmaking life easier for both myself and my friends. Convenient! Enjoy using it!

data.name: AccessDeniedMessage
data.value: At the moment, new users have limited access to the bot.

data.name: InputErrorMessage
data.value: An error occurred, please make sure you entered valid data
